email_body: -----Original Message----- From: O'rourke, Tim Sent: Tuesday, November 13, 2001 7:29 AM To: Allen, Phillip K. Subject: RE: Yes I have. I'm getting all the details on the 4 options I have with the project: Terminate Postpone until Q1 Postpone until deal Closure continue as planned. When I get this info I'll talk with you about it. We're currently about to end Phase 2 (approx 50% completed). -----Original Message----- From: Allen, Phillip K. Sent: Tuesday, November 13, 2001 9:19 AM To: O'rourke, Tim Subject: Tim, Have you considered reducing the scope or terminating the Accenture project to conserve cash? Where are we in terms of %complete? Phillip
